# barStyle

**Instance Property**

The navigation bar style that specifies its appearance.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var barStyle: UIBarStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarStyle] for possible values. The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarStyle/default].

It is permissible to set the value of this property when the navigation bar is being managed by a navigation controller object.

## Setting the bar’s style

- **UIBarStyle**: Defines the stylistic appearance of different types of views.
